resources.string: SoPan will track your location and find the most suitable solar panel for you!

Type: Polycrystalline 
solar cells Voltage at Pmax (Vmp): 18V
Current at Pmax (Imp): 2.78A 
Open-circuit voltage (Voc): 22.4V 
Short-circuit current (Isc): 3.24A 
Size: 540x 670x 30 mm
1. Find your roof \n2. Stick solar panel using glue \n3. Voila free electricity
